name: The Adventures of French Fry Man
name_original: The Adventures of French Fry Man
description:
The Adventures of French Fry man is a short platforming game in which you play as George the French Fry Man! Your goal is to escape from the evil hands that are trying to eat you while avoiding the soda spilled about! Can you escape without being eaten?

Please note: this game was made during a freshman semester class by someone who had never used GameMaker prior to this game. There won't be any future updates, but I wanted to post it for fun! Thank you!
